sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'
import MyDropdown from './MyDropdown'


export default function NewRecordForm(){
  const genderList = ['Male', 'Female', 'Other']
  const bloodGroupList = ['A+', 'A-', 'B+', 'B-', 'AB+', 'AB-', 'O+', 'O-']

  const [name, setName] = useState(null)
  const [gender, setGender] = useState(null)
  const [phone, setPhone] = useState(null)
  const [blood, setBlood] = useState(null)
  const [units, setUnits] = useState(null)


  return (
    <Form>
      <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formBasicEmail">
        <Form.Label onSubmit={(e)=>{setName(e.target.value)}}>Name</Form.Label>
        <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="Enter email" />
      </Form.Group>

      <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formBasicEmail">
        <Form.Label>Gender</Form.Label>
        <MyDropdown optionList={genderList} onCha/>
      </Form.Group>

      <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formBasicEmail">
        <Form.Label>Phone No</Form.Label>
        <Form.Control type="number" placeholder="Enter email" />
      </Form.Group>

      <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formBasicEmail">
        <Form.Label>Blood Group</Form.Label>
        <MyDropdown optionList={bloodGroupList}/>
      </Form.Group>

      <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formBasicEmail">
        <Form.Label>Units</Form.Label>
        <Form.Control type="number" placeholder="Enter email"/>
      </Form.Group>

      <Button variant="outline-light" type="submit">
        Add
      </Button>
    </Form>
  )
}
